recipesJson.name: Glazed Strawberry Cheesecake
recipesJson.author: Spycke
recipesJson.description:
This started with a test. Wanted a strawberry cheesecake, but this time with strawberries way up front. 
3 days: Cheesecake had some weird off notes and strawberries were drowning somewhere at the bottom.
7 days: Strawberries took over the mix pushing back the cheesecake. Crust was at place though
14 days: This is the moment where all flavors melt together in a well rounded flavorful recipe with strawberry up front like it was ment to be.
The only change I made was lowering SS to 0.33.
